item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
item.description: Gold settled 0.7% higher, up for a second consecutive session, and silver rose 0.2%, up for four consecutive sessions.

item.title: Dow Industrials Steady; Bond Yields Grind Higher
item.description: Major indexes traded lower in their first post-Christmas Day session, while a recent bond-market selloff deepened.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Falls
item.description: U.S. natural gas fell, pulling back after trading at $4 overnight for the first time in nearly two years.

item.title: The Hedge-Fund Trade of the Year: Betting on Argentina's Chain-Saw-Wielding President
item.description: One of Wall Street’s hottest trades has nothing to do with crypto, EVs or AI. It’s the country infamous among investors for serial debt defaults.

item.title: America's Big Natural-Gas Footprint Is About to Get Even Bigger
item.description: Drillers are looking ahead to new export hubs and easier regulations under the coming Trump presidency.
